title: Eames Style Lounge Stool H Miller Version
body: The iconic Eames Style Lounger that was designed in 1956 is best complimented with Eames Style Lounger Stool to achieve ultimate comfort from head down to calf. The backstory of this iconic duo began when Charles Eames designed a famous chair for a Hollywood director and the news spread like fire that it still remains the best-seller for more than 50 years after it was designed because of its fabulous intricate design and supreme comfort. A true classic in the history of modern furniture that has stood the test of time.
